definitions.title: vb. denom. Pō‘.
definitions.body: glean (grapes or olives; [[לִפֵּט]] of grain);—Impf. 2 ms. [[תְּעוֹלֵל]] Le 19:10 (obj. [[כֶּרֶם]]; ‖[[תְּלַפֵּט]]), De 24:21 (abs., + [[אַחֲרֶיְ]]); 3 mpl. fig. (+ Inf. abs.) [[עוֹלֵל יְעוֹלְלוּ כַגֶּפֶן שְׁאֵרִית]] [[יִשְׂרָאֵל]] Je 6:9; [[וַיְעׂלְלֻהוּ]] Ju Jdg 20:45 they made a gleaning of them (i. e. smote the fugitives).
